ResearchProjectDef.label: Production of simple stimulants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore the new possibilities of different drugs and plants for the production of simple stimulants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production of advanced stimulants
ResearchProjectDef.description: New research allows more effective stimulants to be produced.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Injectable stimulants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create powerful short-term stimulants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hemp processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Experiments on cannabis have taught us how to use it effectively for pleasure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Poppy processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The study of the properties of poppy made it possible to isolate substances from it for the production of a very strong prihotropic substance - opium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vaccine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create vaccines to protect against all sorts of diseases.
